pages.text: Should you wish to rotate blocks around in the world, the $(item)Adz$() is the tool for you.$(br2)Right clicking any block with the $(item)Adz$() rotates it around the axis you clicked on. You can use this to rotate pistons, stairs, furnaces and many more.$(br2)See also, the $(l:intro/keybinds)Lock Rotation keybind$().
